Documentation of TRACO

Contents:

  • Working with MTZ files
    • Intensities
    • Structure factors
  • Working with HKL
  • Working with hkl
  • Working with SCA
  • Help

Introduction

TRACO is a script that helps to deal with multi-lattice translocation defects. If translocation defects are present, they may affect the quality of electron density dramatically.

TRACO works with MTZ files with intensities or structure factors, HKL files from XDS, hkl files for SHELX, and also with SCA files.

Example

The very first structure tested with TRACO is (Kristyna et al.).

Help

python3 traco.py --help

More information on Help is here.
